languages.text: Вернувшись со своим великолепным трофеем, Ксавьер Калькасар торжественно передал Вольному Торговцу регалии коменданта Простора. Осадное положение, объявленное им в начале кризиса, так и не было отменено — Лорд-инквизитор пресытился вольницей, царствовавшей в Просторе, и желал передать всю власть в одни надежные руки. Сам он планировал как можно скорее отбыть на поиски нового Осколка К'тан, но судьба не дала ему продолжить свое грандиозное начинание.

Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the Warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one trusted pair of hands. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.
languages.original_text: Вернувшись со своим великолепным трофеем, Ксавьер Калькасар торжественно передал Вольному Торговцу регалии коменданта Простора. Осадное положение, объявленное им в начале кризиса, так и не было отменено — Лорд-инквизитор пресытился вольницей, царствовавшей в Просторе, и желал передать всю власть в одни надежные руки. Сам он планировал как можно скорее отбыть на поиски нового Осколка К'тан, но судьба не дала ему продолжить свое грандиозное начинание.

traits.locale_text: Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the emergency law that he declared at the start of the crisis. Lord Inquisitor had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained in one firm hand. As for himself, he wanted to embark on the search for the next C'Tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue his grand quest.

As for himself, he wanted to embark on the search for the next C'Tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue his grand quest.

He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one hand. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.

Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the Warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one trusted pair of hands. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.

languages.text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎带着他辉煌的战利品凯旋，将“科罗努斯守护者”的头衔庄严地赐予了行商浪人。大审判官并没有取消他在危机开始时颁布的戒严令，他已经受够了科罗努斯扩区的混乱，希望他忠实的盟友能将所有权力牢牢握在手中。至于他自己，他打算尽快开始寻找下一个星神碎片，然而，命运却没有允许他继续完成进行这项伟大的使命。
languages.original_text: Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the Warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one trusted pair of hands. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.

traits.locale_text: 希维尔·卡尔卡扎带着他辉煌的战利品凯旋，庄严地将科罗努斯守护者的头衔赐予了行商浪人。他并没有取消他在危机开始时颁布的戒严令，他已经受够了科罗努斯扩区的混乱，希望他忠实的盟友能将所有权力牢牢握在手中。至于他自己，他打算尽快开始寻找下一个星神碎片，然而，命运却没有允许他继续完成进行这项伟大的使命。

languages.text: Als Xavier Calcazar mit seiner atemberaubenden Trophäe zurückkehrte, übergab er die Insignien des Hüters der Ausdehnung feierlich an {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Er hob das Kriegsrecht nicht auf, dass er zu Beginn der Krise ausgerufen hatte — der Großinquisitor hatte genug von der Unordnung in der Ausdehnung gehabt und wollte sichergehen, dass die Macht fest in Händen blieb, denen man vertrauen konnte. Was ihn selbst anging: Er wollte so schnell wie möglich nach dem nächsten C'tan-Fragment suchen, doch das Schicksal gestattete ihm nicht, diese große Mission fortzusetzen.
languages.original_text: Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the Warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one trusted pair of hands. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.

traits.locale_text: Als Xavier Calcazar mit seiner atemberaubenden Trophäe zurückkehrte, übergab er die Insignien des Hüters der Ausdehnung feierlich an {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Er hob das Kriegsrecht nicht auf, dass er zu Beginn der Krise ausgerufen hatte — der Großinquisitor hatte genug von der Unordnung in der Ausdehnung gehabt und wollte sichergehen, dass die Macht fest in seiner Hand blieb. Was ihn selbst anging: Er wollte so schnell wie möglich nach dem nächsten C'tan-Fragment suchen, doch das Schicksal gestattete ihm nicht, diese große Mission fortzusetzen.

languages.text: De retour avec son magnifique trophée, Xavier Calcazar remit solennellement l'insigne de gardien des Étendues {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Cependant, il n'abrogea pas la loi martiale qu'il avait décrétée au début de la crise. Le seigneur inquisiteur en avait assez du désordre qui régnait sur les Étendues et voulait veiller à ce que le pouvoir reste fermement dans des mains de confiance. Lui-même souhaitait se lancer au plus vite à la recherche de la prochaine Écharde C'tan, mais le destin ne lui permit pas de poursuivre cette glorieuse quête.
languages.original_text: Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the Warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one trusted pair of hands. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.

traits.locale_text: De retour avec son magnifique trophée, Xavier Calcazar remit solennellement l'insigne de gardien des Étendues {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}. Cependant, il n'abrogea pas la loi martiale qu'il avait décrétée au début de la crise. Le seigneur inquisiteur en avait assez du désordre qui régnait sur les Étendues et voulait veiller à ce que le pouvoir reste fermement dans une seule main. Lui-même souhaitait se lancer au plus vite à la recherche de la prochaine Écharde C'tan, mais le destin ne lui permit pas de poursuivre cette glorieuse quête.

languages.text: Cuando regresó con su magnífico trofeo, Xavier Calcazar entregó con solemnidad los atavíos del Guardián de la Extensión a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. No levantó la ley marcial que había declarado al comienzo de la crisis; el Lord Inquisidor ya se había cansado del caos que reinaba en la Extensión y quería asegurarse de que el poder permanecía en una sola mano de confianza. En cuanto a él, quiso partir de inmediato en busca del próximo fragmento de C'tan, pero el destino no le permitió continuar con su gran misión.
languages.original_text: Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the Warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one trusted pair of hands. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.

traits.locale_text: Cuando regresó con su magnífico trofeo, Xavier Calcazar entregó con solemnidad los atavíos del Guardián de la Extensión a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. No levantó la ley marcial que había declarado al comienzo de la crisis; el Lord Inquisidor ya se había cansado del caos que reinaba en la Extensión y quería asegurarse de que el poder permanecía en una sola mano. En cuanto a él, quiso partir de inmediato en busca del próximo fragmento de C'tan, pero el destino no le permitió continuar con su gran misión.

languages.text: 立派な戦利品を持って戻ってきたザビエル・カルカサルは、厳粛にエクスパンスの監視官の礼服を自由開拓者に手渡した。彼は危機の始まりに宣言した戒厳令を解除しなかった。ロード・インクィジターはエクスパンスに蔓延る無秩序にうんざりしており、権力がしっかりと握られたままであることを確認したかったのだ。彼自身は、できるだけ早く次のク＝タン・シャードを探しに出かけたかったが、運命は彼にこの壮大な探求を続けることを許さなかった。
languages.original_text: Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the Warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one trusted pair of hands. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.

traits.locale_text: 立派な戦利品を持って戻ってきたザビエル・カルカサルは、厳粛にエクスパンスの監視官の礼服をローグトレーダーに手渡した。彼は危機の始まりに宣言した戒厳令を解除しなかった。ロード・インクィジターはエクスパンスに蔓延る無秩序にうんざりしており、権力が一つの手に握られたままであることを確認したかったのだ。彼自身は、できるだけ早く次のク＝タン・シャードを探しに出かけたかったが、運命は彼にこの壮大な探求を続けることを許さなかった。

languages.text: Muazzam bir ganimetle geri dönen Xavier Calcazar, Enginlik'in Dizdarı ünvanını resmî bir törenle Hür Tacir'e teslim etti. Krizin başlangıcında yürürlüğe koyduğu sıkıyönetimi kaldırmadı. Lord Engizisyoncu, düzensizliğin Enginlik'te yeterince uzun süre hüküm sürdüğüne kanaat getirmişti ve gücün güvenilir bir çift elde, sağlamlıkla kalmasını istiyordu. Kendisi ise bir an önce yola çıkıp bir sonraki C'tan Parçası'nın arayışına katılmak niyetinde olsa da kader, bu şanlı vazifesini gerçekleştirmesine mâni olacaktı.
languages.original_text: Returning with his magnificent trophy, Xavier Calcazar solemnly handed the regalia of the Warden of the Expanse to the Rogue Trader. He did not call off the martial law he had declared at the start of the crisis — the Lord Inquisitor had had enough of the disorder that reigned in the Expanse and wanted to make sure that power remained firmly in one trusted pair of hands. As for himself, he wanted to embark as soon as possible on a search for the next C'tan Shard, but fate did not allow him to continue this grand quest.

traits.locale_text: Muazzam bir ganimetle geri dönen Xavier Calcazar, Enginlik'in Koruyucusu ünvanını resmî bir törenle Hür Tacir'e teslim etti. Krizin başlangıcında yürürlüğe koyduğu sıkıyönetimi kaldırmadı. Lord Engizisyoncu, düzensizliğin Enginlik'te yeterince uzun süre hüküm sürdüğüne kanaat getirmişti ve gücün güvenilir bir çift elde, sağlam bir şekilde kalmasını istiyordu. Kendisi ise yola çıkıp bir sonraki C'tan Parçası'nın arayışına bir an önce katılmak istiyordu ancak kader, bu şanlı göreve çıkmasına izin vermeyecekti.
